title: The Right ingredients
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke, George Cass, Arts Victoria, Australian Bicentennial Authority, Australian Film Commission, Department of Sport and Recreation and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: A look behind the scenes of the Australian Ballet School and the preparations of blocking the dancers in the classroom to the final performance. We see students rehearsing and dancing to the modern ballet “Signatures” and the classical ballet “The Nutcracker”. Contains commentary from Dame Margaret Scott and Kevin Coe.
